content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceed. Provide an example

that wraps the text into lines with length of 80 characters:

```julia
wrap_string("Hello world! This is a very long sentence."; text_width=80)
# "Hello
world!
This
is
a
very
long
sentence."
```

### Bonus 1: wrap_text

Write another function `wrap_text` that iterates over lines of the string and wraps them according to `text_width`. Provide an example that wraps each line into a maximum of 4 words (not characters):

```julia
wrap_string("Hello world!
This is a very long sentence."; text_width=10, word_number=4)
# "Hello
world!
This
is
a
very
long
sentence."
```
